devdoc.author: Shumpei Koike - <shumpei.koike@bridges.inc>

bid(uint256,string,string).details: Bids to the post, sharing what kind of Ads would be public. The owner of the Ad space can select the one according to not only the price but also the preference inside the metadata.

params.metadata: string of the hashed path to the storage

close(uint256).details: Closes the offering and mints the NFT to the successful bidder. The amount would be paid to the post owner.

newPost(string,uint256,uint256,uint256,u.details: Creates a new post where the owner who has the advertising area can public the space. The basic infomation of the area is described on the storage, which is accessed by the metadata hash.

params.fromTimestamp: uint256 of the timestamp to display the ad
params.height: uint256 of the display height for the Ad space
params.metadata: string of the hashed path to the storage
params.toTimestamp: uint256 of the timestamp to display the ad
params.width: uint256 of the display width for the Ad space

refund(uint256).details: Can refund the amount if you want to cancel or the other is determinted as the successful bidder.

devdoc.title: AdManager - allows anyone to create a post and bit to the post.
